about_the_game:
You can currently play Number Crunchers for free in My Neighborhood Arcade.

Enjoy Several Number based puzzle casual games.

Power Puzzle
Your mission is to connect at least 4 cells with the same number to merge and create a bigger number. After each round, more random numbers will appear to match with until you run out of space. (Unlock the Achievement by getting to 128.)

Get 11
In this checkerboard of limited cells, your mission is to connect at least 2 cells with the same number to create a bigger number. After each round, more random numbers will appear to attempt to match until you get to 11. (Unlock the Achievement by getting to 11.)

2048 Bricks
In this Tetris fashioned game, tap on the desired column to drop the current brick down. Merge similar numbers to earn points and make more space. (Unlock the Achievement by getting to 2048.)

Hexa Power Puzzle
In this hexagon version, your mission is to connect at least 4 cells with the same number to merge and create a bigger number. After each round, more random numbers will appear to match with until you run out of space. (Unlock the Achievement by getting to 128.)

10x10
Provided is a 10×10 square grid and simple geometry pieces. Simply try to fit pieces into the grid to complete vertical or horizontal lines to clear blocks. (Unlock the Achievement by getting 10 rows/columns in the same game.)

Tickets
Win and Use My Neighborhood Arcade Tickets to unlock the games and themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5-5200u
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intell HD Graphics 5500
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5-5200U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti or AMD R7 290

short_description: Enjoy Several Number based puzzle casual games: Power Puzzle, Get 11, 2048 Bricks, Hexa Power Puzzle and 10x10. You can currently play for free in My Neighborhood Arcade.
